contentList.content: Allows you to vanish into the Ethereal Plane at the end of your turn, becoming <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLINK_VANISH">untargetable</LSTag> until your next turn. You are able to choose between <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="SYR_Shout_Blink_Focused">Focused Blink</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="SYR_Shout_Blink_Unstable">Unstable Blink</LSTag>.

While in combat you vanish into the Ethereal Plane at the end of every other turn, becoming untargetable.

On your next turn you return with the option to teleport [1]. This can occur a total of [2] times before the spell fades.

This always activates on the first turn of combat.
At the end of every other turn the affected entity vanishes into the Ethereal Plane, becoming <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLINK_VANISH">untargetable</LSTag> until its next turn.

While in combat you have a 50% chance at the end of your turn to vanish into the Ethereal Plane, becoming untargetable.

On your next turn you return with the option to teleport [1].
At the end of every turn the affected entity has a chance to vanish into the Ethereal Plane, becoming <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLINK_VANISH">untargetable</LSTag> until its next turn.
Affected entity is in the Ethereal Plane, where it can't be harmed, seen, or affected.
Dismiss the effects of <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="SYR_Shout_Blink_Focused">Focused Blink</LSTag> or <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="SYR_Shout_Blink_Unstable">Unstable Blink</LSTag> early.
